content.rendered:
For our Orchid lovers, our deluxe potted Orchid plants are a symbol of luxury and refined taste. An elegant and enduring gift that leaves a timeless reminder of your love and care.

Each Orchid plant is carefully selected personally by us, then potted into a white ceramic planter, finished with moss and trailing ribbon, and elegantly presented in a gift box for delivery.

Our range of Phalaenopsis Orchid plants are sourced locally from our premium plant nurseries.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this philosophy. All L&R designs are unique and one-of-a-kind. Images provided are for illustrative purposes only. The orchid plant you receive will depend on the season and availability. Place your trust in us to choose the finest phalaenopsis orchid to convey your sentiments.

Small vase size: 20cm H x 15cm W approx.

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
